data.title: Simplify Selection Ranges
data.statement: You are given an array of numbers  and must simplify the array by replacing ranges of 3 or more items with the shorthand #-# equivalent and returning the result as a string, sorted from lowest to highest
data.constraints: 1 ≤ [[N]] ≤ 100 where [[N]] is each item in the array
data.inputDescription: <<Line 1:>> An array of digits to simplify and reduce.
data.outputDescription: A comma separated string containing the sorted and simplified range sets.

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

You are given an array of numbers and must simplify the array by replacing ranges of 3 or more items with the shorthand #-# equivalent and returning the result as a string, sorted from lowest to highest
Input
Line 1: An array of digits to simplify and reduce.
Output
A comma separated string containing the sorted and simplified range sets.
Constraints
1 ≤ N ≤ 100 where N is each item in the array
Example
Input
[1,2,5,6,7,9,12,55,56,57,58,60,61,62,64,65,70]
Output
1,2,5-7,9,12,55-58,60-62,64,65,70
